== Usage ==

The meter min attribute specifies the lower bound of the range.

== Values ==

The meter min attribute must be a [http://www.whatwg.org/specs/web-apps/current-work/multipage/infrastructure.html#valid-floating-point-number valid floating point number].

== Elements ==

You can use the `min` attribute on the following elements:

  * [MeterElement <meter>]
